description:
This test fails at a pretty high rate in the non-voting neutron full ssh job which is preventing it from being made voting.

http://logs.openstack.org/20/305120/15/check/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh/11a64b8/console.html#_2016-07-02_21_15_21_884827

2016-07-02 21:15:21.884917 | Captured traceback:
2016-07-02 21:15:21.884933 | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
2016-07-02 21:15:21.884956 |     Traceback (most recent call last):
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885005 |       File "tempest/api/compute/servers/test_server_personality.py", line 141, in test_can_create_server_with_max_number_personality_files
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885029 |         'sudo cat %s' % i['path']))
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885084 |       File "tempest/common/utils/linux/remote_client.py", line 36, in wrapper
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885115 |         return function(self, *args, **kwargs)
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885158 |       File "tempest/common/utils/linux/remote_client.py", line 92, in exec_command
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885185 |         return self.ssh_client.exec_command(cmd)
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885226 |       File "tempest/lib/common/ssh.py", line 168, in exec_command
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885254 |         stderr=err_data, stdout=out_data)
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885305 |     tempest.lib.exceptions.SSHExecCommandFailed: Command 'set -eu -o pipefail; PATH=$PATH:/sbin; sudo cat /etc/test0.txt', exit status: 1, stderr:
2016-07-02 21:15:21.885334 |     cat: can't open '/etc/test0.txt': No such file or directory

http://logstash.openstack.org/#dashboard/file/logstash.json?query=message%3A%5C%22cat%3A%20can't%20open%20'%2Fetc%2Ftest0.txt'%3A%20No%20such%20file%20or%20directory%5C%22%20AND%20build_name%3A%5C%22gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh%5C%22%20AND%20tags%3A%5C%22console%5C%22&from=7d

title: test_can_create_server_with_max_number_personality_files fails in gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh job

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
The server create request is here:

http://logs.openstack.org/20/305120/15/check/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh/11a64b8/console.html#_2016-07-02_21_15_21_886505

I can see the 5 files to inject in the request.

The instance is 'built' at this point in n-cpu:

http://logs.openstack.org/20/305120/15/check/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh/11a64b8/logs/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz#_2016-07-02_20_47_10_630

A floating IP with address 172.24.5.9 is added to the server here:

http://logs.openstack.org/20/305120/15/check/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh/11a64b8/console.html#_2016-07-02_21_15_21_896003

which is:

2016-07-02 20:47:12,997 30918 DEBUG    [tempest.lib.common.rest_client] Request - Headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'X-Auth-Token': '<omitted>', 'Accept': 'application/json'}

Right after that the test SSH's into the server using the floating IP and tries to cat /etc/test0.txt but the file doesn't exist.

--

It doesn't look like we do any debug logging when injecting the files into the guest, so I'll push a nova patch to add some debug logging there.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Aha!

http://logs.openstack.org/20/305120/15/check/gate-tempest-dsvm-neutron-full-ssh/11a64b8/logs/etc/nova/nova.conf.txt.gz

[libvirt]
inject_partition = -2

We don't inject the files because of ^:

-2 means disable file injection.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/0c0f60031acba11d0bab0617f68b95d9b5eb8d1d/nova/conf/libvirt.py#L66

Nova doesn't even log anything:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/faf50a747e03873c3741dac89263a80112da915a/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py#L3030
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Looks like this is not a regression, the logic is the same in stable/mitaka:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/mitaka/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py#L3293
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Tempest is also affected here since we'll need to add a configuration option to Tempest to toggle tests that rely on file injection since it's configurable in Nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/336949
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: I guess tempest already has a compute-feature-enabled.personality config option but it defaults to True, which doesn't line up with nova's default for libvirt with inject_partition=-2.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/336951
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/336951
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/tempest/commit/?id=0baba7096a9abd0fce430f3e49d201595a067a2a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0baba7096a9abd0fce430f3e49d201595a067a2a
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Jul 3 19:24:08 2016 -0400

    Disable file injection by default
    
    Nova change 9ce99a44cf85e431227536e2251ef05b52e61524 disabled
    file injection with the libvirt driver by default back in Icehouse.
    
    With nova change Ieb0f64847e31622bd86d1c5f4672c37b3a89f197,
    requesting file injection on a host that disables it will result
    in a failure.
    
    Tempest should also disable file injection by default since the
    entire stack has to be configured properly to test this.
    
    Change-Id: Ibcf7f87feda86242de17c035fd62a86aabebf919
    Closes-Bug: #1598581
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Nice finding. But as it is disabled by default in nova, how other personality tests in same class passing and this test also not failing always.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content: gmann, the failure only shows up if you have run_validation=True in tempest.conf which is only in the non-voting neutron full ssh job. That's part of the reason I want to get that job voting since it keeps finding issues but we don't notice because it's non-voting.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/336949
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
